remarks: Value of the map defined by ~ df-mapd at an atom.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Feb-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
mapd1dim2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapd1dim2.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapd1dim2.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` U ) $.
mapd1dim2.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
mapd1dim2.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
mapd1dim2.o $e |- O = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapd1dim2.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapd1dim2.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
mapd1dim2.t $e |- ( ph -> Q e. A ) $.
mapd1dim2lem1N $p |- ( ph -> ( M ` Q ) = { f e. F | E. v e. Q ( O ` { v } ) = ( L ` f ) } ) $.
$d F f v $.
$d K f $.
$d L v $.
$d O v $.
$d Q f v $.
$d U v $.
$d W f $.
$d f ph v $.
